# Interface IntentNodeFactoryInterface

Interface for intent node factory parameters.

interface IntentNodeFactoryInterface {  
executionConfig?: [IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.IntentNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
llm?: [LLM](/classes/primitives_llm_llm.LLM);  
textEmbedder?: [TextEmbedder](/classes/primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder);  
}
